TopicTitle: How to control my dammed Kerbal on ladders?

Articles.Content: I have a moon lander with a lader that goes from the ground up past the fuel tank to a little walkway that leads to the cabin. How the hell do I get him off the lader? Once he gets to the top the little green retard just lets go and falls to the bottom?

Ah, Bill is not a retard, that would be someone else.

In future make sure the ladders connect all the way to the walkway, and test it on the pad.

You could try to jump (space) off the end, but he will probably just jump outward. As you are on the Mun, you could just use the jetpack to get up to the walkway.

Tip #1) Mind your attitude.

Tip #2) Follow MBobrik's advice and put at least one chunk of ladder in there at an angle. The ladder of the hatch is too far back to reach.

Tip #3) It's Mun... just use the EVA pack. Or jump, you ship ain't that tall.
